solution_line_template: Toby gave each of his brothers {fraction_given_to_each_brother} * ${total_money_given_by_father} = $<<{fraction_given_to_each_brother}*{total_money_given_by_father}={money_given_to_each_brother}>>{money_given_to_each_brother}.

Toby gave his {number_of_brothers} brothers a total of {number_of_brothers} * ${money_given_to_each_brother} = $<<{number_of_brothers}*{money_given_to_each_brother}={total_money_given_to_brothers}>>{total_money_given_to_brothers}.
